name: Fouriershaper
description:
Match the given shape to advance to the next level.

You can control the curve by adjusting the controls on the panel - or reset by turning them all to zero again.

When you sucessfully match the pattern, the outline will turn green and a new level will unlock.
You can select any level using the knob on the bottom right.
Free play is enabled by setting the knob to the leftmost postion.

You think you matched the pattern but the rotation just won't fit?

No problem! Rotate your art by turning the knob in the upper left corner.

If you're interested in gaining an intuition about what is going on in this game,
we recommend this explanatory video by 3Blue1Brown. The animations in that video also inspired this game.

Any feedback is greatly appreciated!

The game was made by Encypruon and me.
